RelatedSentence: The White House says the UN and its partners are urgently assisting the more than 300,000 refugees that have crossed into Ethiopia , Kenya , Sudan and Uganda , as well as internally - displaced persons in South Sudan .

The White House says the UN and its partners are urgently assisting the more than 300,000 refugees that have crossed into Ethiopia , Kenya , Sudan and Uganda , as well as internally - displaced persons in South Sudan .
Obama authorized the emergency funding ahead of a South Sudan pledging conference scheduled for Tuesday in Oslo , Norway .
The US says months of conflict between South Sudan 's government and rebel forces have left the country at risk of famine unless humanitarian agencies increase their assistance .
